title: Does Mysticism Keep Men Sane? The Roles of Sacrifice, Death and Beauty in the Weaving of Redemption.
description:
We discuss Beauty as a theory of what holds the universe together.
Truth and Goodness held in union by Beauty
Hope and Faith held in union by Love
Feminine and Masculine

Alma Deutscher composing on the fly.  https://youtu.be/hvECZ_ZXGqs

John Ortberg teaching on Hope, quote by Vaclav Havel and philosophy of Hope from ancient times:
https://youtu.be/iC7OpQdFXpk?t=1850

Chloe Valdary summarizing the Theory of Enchantment
https://youtu.be/iC7OpQdFXpk?t=1850

D. C. Schindler on Hans ur von Balthasar's theology of Beauty
https://youtu.be/b26vvB3-97g

G K. Chesterton
Orthodoxy
